fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.plugins.devs.architectures

Interface ComponentModelArchitectureI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.architectures.ArchitectureI, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ComponentModelArchitecture, RTComponentModelArchitecture

    public interface ComponentModelArchitectureI
extends fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.architectures.ArchitectureI
    The interface ComponentBaseModelArchitectureI declares the methods that are specific to component-based simulation architectures.

    Description

    Invariant

     invariant              true

    Created on : 2018-06-26

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.interfaces.ModelDescriptionI compose(java.lang.String modelURI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent creator, java.lang.String pnipURI, AbstractSimulatorPlugin plugin)
      compose the simulation architecture subtree having the model with URI modelURI at its root by recursively composing the submodels and creating the required coupled model on the component creator that must hold it in the assembly, which has created the required plug-in plugin.
      SimulatorPluginManagementOutboundPort connectRootModelComponent(fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent creator)
      connect the component holding the root model of this architecture with the componnent creator (usually a supervisor component) through the returned simulation plug-in management outbound port.
      ComponentModelDescriptorI getModelDescriptor(java.lang.String uri)
      return the component model descriptor associated to the given model URI.
      java.lang.String getReflectionInboundPortURI(java.lang.String modelURI)
      return the URI of the reflection inbound port of the component holding the corresponding model.

 post   true                    // no postcondition.

      • compose

        fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.interfaces.ModelDescriptionI compose(java.lang.String modelURI,
                                                                   fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent creator,
                                                                   java.lang.String pnipURI,
                                                                   AbstractSimulatorPlugin plugin)
                                                            throws java.lang.Exception
        compose the simulation architecture subtree having the model with URI modelURI at its root by recursively composing the submodels and creating the required coupled model on the component creator that must hold it in the assembly, which has created the required plug-in plugin.

        Contract

         pre    modelURI != null
 pre    creator != null
 pre     plugin != null && plugin.getPluginURI().equals(modelURI)
 post   true                    // no postcondition.
        Parameters:
        modelURI - URI of the coupled model to be composed.
        creator - component that executes the method and that holds the model.
        pnipURI - parent notification inbound port URI of the creator component.
        plugin - coordination plug-in of the creator.
        Returns:
        the reference to the simulation engine executing the model.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - to do.
